result.reason: Feature request to sync connection tree selection with active tab — clicking a tab should select the tree node, and clicking a connected tree node should activate the tab
result.approach: In ConnectionWindow_GotFocus or a new tab-activated event handler, find the active tab's ConnectionInfo and set ConnectionTree.SelectedObject to that node. For the tree side, on single-click of an already-connected node, find its ConnectionWindow tab and activate it (DockContent.Activate). Add an option in Settings to enable/disable this sync behavior.
